function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of uv lights and their maintenance may expose healthcare staff and patients to adverse uv effects.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to ozone from ionizers","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous operation of uv lights and fans may lead to maintenance issues and malfunction","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective sterilization and exhaust of air may lead to contamination and disease spread","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure of guinea pigs to ward air may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imbalanced airflow between animal enclosures","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air mixing in patient wards","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diminished uv intensity at height 1.8 m","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High negative ion concentration in the ionizer enclosure","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dust-related tb outbreak due to ionizer cleaning","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tb in the exposure chambers","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity of tb-infected animals in exposure chambers","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination of the environment with tb particulates","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of airborne transmission of tb disease","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tb in a clinical setting.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate uv intensity due to lack of maintenance and degradation of uv bulbs.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective air mixing in patient rooms","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adverse effect of increasing relative humidity on uv germicidal efficacy","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher ion densities achieved in poultry studies may not be applicable to healthcare environments, reducing the effectiveness of ionizers in preventing tb transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulation of potentially infectious particles onto adjacent surfaces or grounded parts of the ionizer, leading to localized outbreak of tb-infected animals and potential risk of transmission to humans.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Static charge interference with medical equipment due to ionizers, potentially leading to malfunctions or hazards in medical equipment.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential differences in ionizer effect on tb transmission between ward and animal facility","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tb infection spreading in overcrowded settings","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in indoor settings","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious spread of mycobacterium tuberculosis through airborne droplets","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dormant tuberculosis bacteria causing disease years after initial infection","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Drug-resistant tuberculosis requiring prolonged and challenging treatment","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emergence of drug-resistant m. tuberculosis strains","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to untreated air from an hiv-tb ward","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of infectious particles in the air","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate air circulation in the ward","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Upper-room uv lights and negative air ionization might not be effective at preventing airborne tuberculosis transmission in humans.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control in healthcare settings","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The spread of contagious diseases in smart cities due to lack of effective monitoring and interpretation of health-related data.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drones for mobility and surveillance actions","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High population density in urban areas","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Geographic distribution may contribute to contagion in densely populated areas","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of smartphones for monitoring urban agglomerations","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of overwhelming health systems in resource-limited settings due to the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus survival on various surfaces and at low temperatures","category":"Built Environment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differing levels of hazard and exposure potential to covid-19 in various workplace environments , hospitals and airports .","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Application of failure mode and effects analysis fmea to different workplaces for risk assessment.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in the built environment","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate biocontainment features in healthcare facilities","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Degradation and fragmentation of natural habitats in urban areas","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to pollutants and parasites transmission in urban areas","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of study sites not located within urban or peri-urban areas","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for green space quality in study design","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to assess individual factors due to lack of objective measurements","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of green space quality assessment","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"}]}
